name: Moonbreaker for Christmas!
blurb: Back the newest edition to the Project Gert story, Moonbreaker!

rewards.reward: Get the game for free! Limit of 50 available. Only available on Xbox 360. If we run out, for whatever reason, you'll need to select an alternate reward. The game will sell for $1, so this shouldn't be a big issue for you.
Get a PDF digital copy of Project Gert the novel. This may be republished, so it will be subject to change when republished.

Get full access to the releasable source code for Project Gert. This does not include engine code. It does not include comments. This does not include updates. It is only a learning tool for those interested or want insight into how the algorithms were implemented. Engine code is not for sale or redistribute-able.
Credit in the final game as a backer.
I'll follow you on Twitter for a year. Or I'll add you on Facebook. I may keep you on either for quite a bit longer, but a year is promised.

Your Gamertag is added to the source code of the game. This will unlock certain features, including a live  Ferris Physics Mod. where you can modify the physics on the fly. This is a developers tool I wrote specifically for this game. It is not available to average users to prevent abuse. Other tools may be included as well, included in good faith. I am not responsible for the game crashing when said modifications are in place, in fact, I'm sure you could crash the game with said mods since they will be untested. This is a fun reward because it allows me to do things I could not normally do on Xbox Live, haha. Take that Xbox MVPs, you'll never catch me. :D
Any two $1 rewards. Limited to quantity on hand.
Any three $1 rewards. Limited to quantity on hand.
Any four $1 rewards. Limited to quantity on hand.
All six $1 rewards. Limited to quantity on hand. Haha, see what I did there?

Angel backer status in the credits and your name again in the level selector under one of the puzzles. And if you aren't too lazy, you can pick the characters and design for it, just contact me first I won't hound you for this. You also get the $5 reward of course, because that stuff is awesome. There are only going to be 48 puzzles, so act now.
You get the $10 reward, limited to quantity on hand. The bonus here is that I will send you a post card and fill it with "feelz" about how awesome you are.

You get $15 reward, but I don't write anything on the postcard, except "Thank you" and signed with a douchy signature I worked really hard on, but isn't far from the best you've seen. The bonus here is that you get a copy of Project Gert the novel, which I get for about $6. Shipping in US is free. $5 worldwide. Getting it from Amazon right now will cost you more, and probably won't be the version I send to backers since I am in a sci-fi writers group where they are helping me re-write it. You can of course just go on Amazon and order the old version, but I'll wonder why you didn't want all my other nice rewards along with it and I'll be sad.
You get $20 reward, but with twice the number of books. Now you can start your own cult.

At this point, you think entirely too much of me. Because of this, I try and take advantage of you by offering you a skype call or Xbox Live gaming session, which you will probably ignore. You also get the $28 reward. Limited to quantity on hand.

You are invited to the party. When and where it takes place, is unknown. It is questionable that there will ever even be a party. In the event that there is one, it will be up to you to get there. You also get the $50 reward.
The $75 reward. The bonus here is that I will probably tweet to all my followers about you, and they will think you are great because hey, you just threw down $100 on my project!

Digital Downloads. Digital Downloads. Digital Downloads. It is the future. It's not clear what this means, or how it pertains to the future of digital media, but you will be there and taking full advantage of it. Because you are awesome. You also get the $100 reward. Between you and me, this is the best deal. Limited to quantity on hand.
